event.description: Marco Scutaro walks.
Aaron Hill homers (7) on a fly ball to center field. Marco Scutaro scores.
Alex Rios singles on a line drive to center fielder Torii Hunter.
Vernon Wells grounds into a double play, shortstop Erick Aybar to second baseman Howie Kendrick to first baseman Kendrys Morales. Alex Rios out at 2nd.
Adam Lind doubles (10) on a line drive to right fielder Gary Matthews.
Scott Rolen walks.
Lyle Overbay flies out to right fielder Gary Matthews.
Rod Barajas singles on a ground ball to left fielder Bobby Abreu.
Travis Snider walks. Rod Barajas to 2nd.
Marco Scutaro singles on a ground ball to shortstop Erick Aybar. Rod Barajas scores. Travis Snider to 3rd.
Aaron Hill singles on a ground ball to center fielder Torii Hunter. Travis Snider scores. Marco Scutaro to 2nd.
Alex Rios flies out to center fielder Torii Hunter. Marco Scutaro to 3rd.
Pitching Change: Rafael Rodriguez replaces Anthony Ortega.
Vernon Wells homers (5) on a fly ball to left field. Marco Scutaro scores. Aaron Hill scores.
Adam Lind grounds out, pitcher Rafael Rodriguez to first baseman Kendrys Morales.
Scott Rolen singles on a line drive to left fielder Bobby Abreu.
Lyle Overbay lines into a force out, pitcher Rafael Rodriguez to shortstop Erick Aybar. Scott Rolen out at 2nd.
Rod Barajas pops out to second baseman Howie Kendrick.
Travis Snider grounds out, shortstop Erick Aybar to first baseman Kendrys Morales.
Marco Scutaro grounds out, second baseman Howie Kendrick to first baseman Kendrys Morales.
Aaron Hill grounds out, third baseman Chone Figgins to first baseman Kendrys Morales.
Alex Rios called out on strikes.
Vernon Wells grounds out, third baseman Chone Figgins to first baseman Kendrys Morales.
Adam Lind doubles (11) on a line drive to left fielder Bobby Abreu.
Scott Rolen grounds out, shortstop Erick Aybar to first baseman Kendrys Morales.
Lyle Overbay singles on a ground ball to right fielder Gary Matthews. Adam Lind to 3rd.
Rod Barajas strikes out swinging.
Travis Snider singles on a line drive to right fielder Gary Matthews. Adam Lind scores. Lyle Overbay to 2nd.
Marco Scutaro grounds into a force out, fielded by third baseman Chone Figgins. Lyle Overbay out at 3rd.
Pitching Change: Jason Bulger replaces Rafael Rodriguez.
Aaron Hill singles on a line drive to left fielder Bobby Abreu.
Alex Rios pops out to second baseman Howie Kendrick.
Vernon Wells flies out to right fielder Gary Matthews.
Adam Lind pops out to first baseman Kendrys Morales in foul territory.
Scott Rolen grounds out, third baseman Chone Figgins to first baseman Kendrys Morales.
Lyle Overbay grounds out, second baseman Howie Kendrick to first baseman Kendrys Morales.
Rod Barajas walks.
Travis Snider flies out to right fielder Gary Matthews.
Defensive Substitution: Juan Rivera replaces third baseman Chone Figgins, batting 1st, playing right field.
Defensive Substitution: Robb Quinlan replaces left fielder Bobby Abreu, batting 3rd, playing third base.
Defensive Substitution: Reggie Willits replaces center fielder Torii Hunter, batting 4th, playing left field.
Defensive switch from right field to center field for Gary Matthews.
Pitching Change: Justin Speier replaces Jason Bulger.
Marco Scutaro walks.
Aaron Hill flies out to center fielder Gary Matthews.
Alex Rios walks. Marco Scutaro to 2nd.
With Vernon Wells batting, wild pitch by Justin Speier, Marco Scutaro to 3rd. Alex Rios to 2nd.
Vernon Wells strikes out swinging.
Adam Lind walks.
Scott Rolen singles on a line drive to center fielder Gary Matthews. Marco Scutaro scores. Alex Rios scores. Adam Lind to 3rd.
Lyle Overbay homers (4) on a fly ball to center field. Adam Lind scores. Scott Rolen scores.
Rod Barajas hit by pitch.
Los Angeles Angels Manager Mike Scioscia ejected by HP umpire Bill Hohn.
Travis Snider singles on a line drive to right fielder Juan Rivera. Rod Barajas to 2nd.
Marco Scutaro strikes out swinging.
Jeff Mathis remains in the game as the designated hitter.
Aaron Hill walks.
Alex Rios grounds into a force out, fielded by second baseman Howie Kendrick. Aaron Hill out at 2nd. Alex Rios to 1st.
Vernon Wells flies out to right fielder Juan Rivera.
Adam Lind flies out to left fielder Reggie Willits.
Chone Figgins grounds out, second baseman Aaron Hill to first baseman Lyle Overbay.
Maicer Izturis pops out to third baseman Scott Rolen.
Bobby Abreu grounds out, shortstop Marco Scutaro to first baseman Lyle Overbay.
Torii Hunter singles on a ground ball to right fielder Alex Rios.
Kendrys Morales grounds into a double play, first baseman Lyle Overbay to shortstop Marco Scutaro to first baseman Lyle Overbay. Torii Hunter out at 2nd.
Mike Napoli grounds out, shortstop Marco Scutaro to first baseman Lyle Overbay.
Gary Matthews called out on strikes.
Howie Kendrick singles on a ground ball to right fielder Alex Rios.
Erick Aybar walks. Howie Kendrick to 2nd.
Chone Figgins grounds into a force out, fielded by third baseman Scott Rolen. Howie Kendrick out at 3rd. Erick Aybar to 2nd. Chone Figgins to 1st.
Maicer Izturis pops out to third baseman Scott Rolen.
Bobby Abreu called out on strikes.
Torii Hunter grounds out, first baseman Lyle Overbay to pitcher Roy Halladay.
Kendrys Morales grounds out, shortstop Marco Scutaro to first baseman Lyle Overbay.

Chone Figgins flies out to center fielder Vernon Wells.

Juan Rivera grounds out, third baseman Scott Rolen to first baseman Lyle Overbay. Howie Kendrick to 3rd.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Jeff Mathis replaces Maicer Izturis.
Jeff Mathis singles on a ground ball to left fielder Travis Snider. Howie Kendrick scores.
Robb Quinlan doubles (1) on a line drive to right fielder Alex Rios. Jeff Mathis to 3rd.
Reggie Willits grounds out to first baseman Lyle Overbay.
Pitching Change: Shawn Camp replaces Roy Halladay.
Kendrys Morales singles on a ground ball to third baseman Scott Rolen.
Mike Napoli grounds into a force out, shortstop Marco Scutaro to second baseman Aaron Hill. Kendrys Morales out at 2nd. Mike Napoli to 1st.
Gary Matthews grounds into a force out, first baseman Lyle Overbay to shortstop Marco Scutaro. Mike Napoli out at 2nd. Gary Matthews to 1st.
Howie Kendrick grounds into a force out, third baseman Scott Rolen to second baseman Aaron Hill. Gary Matthews out at 2nd.
